column1: Cognate with Karakhanid [script needed] ‎(kizlēmēk, “to hide, conceal”), [script needed] ‎(kiz, “wardrobe, clothes bag, any kind of cupboard”), Azeri gizləmək ‎(“to hide, conceal”), Chagatai [script needed] ‎(kizlemek, “to hide”), Kipchak [Arabic needed] ‎(kizle-, “to hide”), Turkmen gīzlemek ‎(“to be concealed, put away”), Yakut кистээ ‎(kistee, “to hide, conceal”).
